interventionist.translation[0].definitio: based on the belief of a government or organization that it should take action or spend money to influence the economy (=financial system)  or what happens in other countries
The UN adopted a more interventionist approach in the region.
interventionist.translation[1].definitio: believing that a government should try to influence trade by spending government money
interventionist policies in the car industry
We favour an interventionist role for government in the economy.
